education.description: There I learned full stack web and mobile development, starting from creating a User Interface for web and mobile apps using React to creating a RESTApi using node js and express. I also learned databases, both Realtional and non-relational databases. At the end of my study, I made a Pejoy Store for real project.
In there I majored in financial management, I learned several things such as financial ratio analysis, investment management, macroeconomics and others.
